letters.description: Analyze comprehensive thyroid panels beyond TSH, including Free T3, Free T4, and Antibodies, to establish a biochemical baseline.
Assess and balance the HPT axis by identifying endocrine disruptors and stressors that inhibit thyroid hormone production.
Investigate underlying triggers such as gut dysbiosis, systemic toxicity, or chronic infections that drive thyroid dysfunction.
Implement targeted anti-inflammatory protocols and dietary shifts to lower thyroid antibodies and reduce cellular resistance.
Address critical deficiencies in essential co-factors like Selenium, Zinc, and Iodine required for thyroid hormone conversion.
Optimize mitochondrial function and metabolic rate to resolve fatigue, brain fog, and weight resistance for long-term vitality.
